titles.title: To designate the Department of Veterans Affairs hospital under construction in Aurora, Colorado, as the "Petty Officer 2nd Class Danny Dietz Department of Veterans Affairs Hospital".
To designate the Department of Veterans Affairs hospital under construction in Aurora, Colorado, as the "Petty Officer 2nd Class Danny Dietz Department of Veterans Affairs Hospital".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: Designates the Department of Veterans Affairs hospital under construction on the Fitzsimons Medical Campus in Aurora, Colorado, as the "Petty Officer 2nd Class Danny Dietz Department of Veterans Affairs Hospital."
